This is a guide that documents the development of automated Stage 4 radar precipitation processing across the Edwards Aquifer Region.  Daily rainfall maps  are published at approximately 9:15 AM here - [Edwards Aquifer rainfall](https://0198a52d-8079-4ff0-9716-5f6e6c21fb79.share.connect.posit.cloud/).
